## ISerializable.saveState() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveState(doFullSerialization: boolean): any;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

doFullSerialization


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

If true, this signals that any backing data structures used by this ISerializable should also be serialized. This is used for copy-paste.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

any

a JSON serializable value that records the ISerializable's state.
